Uses of Class
controllers.input.InputHandler

  • Packages that use InputHandler 
    Package Description
    controllers.input  

    • Uses of InputHandler in controllers.input

      Subclasses of InputHandler in controllers.input 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  CurrencyInputHandler
      Handles command line input to add/remove currency.
      class  ExitInputHandler
      Handles command line input to exit to program.
      class  HighScoreInputHandler
      Handles command line input for highscores.
      class  LoadInputHandler
      Handles command line input for loading.
      class  NewInputHandler
      Handles command line input for new.
      class  NullInputHandler
      Handles command line input for unknown commands.
      class  SaveInputHandler
      Handles command line input for saving.
      class  SpawnInputHandler
      Handles the command line input for spawn.
      class  SwitchInputHandler
      Handle command line input for switch.
      Methods in controllers.input that return InputHandler 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static InputHandler InputHandlerFactory.GetInputHandler​(java.lang.String input, Model model, InputController inputController)
      Returns the appropriate InputHandler based on the user input.
